pullRequest.title: Push complex expression filters into Glue metastore
pullRequest.bodyText: Previously, only single value equality filters were pushed down.

nodes.bodyText: What's the issue? Add some details to the commit message and a test.

commit.message:
Push complex expression filters into Glue metastore

Previously, only single value equality filters were pushed down.

afterCommit.message:
Push complex expression filters into Glue metastore

Previously, only single value equality filters were pushed down.

nodes.bodyText:
There are many layers between query and metastore communication and we already had regressions more than once. Can we also have an end-to-end test with Glue metastore showing the functionality works as intended?
This could go into TestHiveGlueMetastore to use real Glue. We probably should add GlueMetastoreStats metric to account for size of responses being pulled from the service.
